cv.title: Marbesol Car Rental
description: Implemented significant visual improvements following UX standards.
Utilized HTML, CSS, PHP, and Vue.js (based on the site's requirements) for all implemented changes.
Managed, hired, and implemented software and modules for the development of a new area in tourist rental management.
Performed maintenance, optimization, and modifications on all WordPress-based websites.
Proposed, designed, and programmed the redesign of all company emails, including registration, car rentals, payments, and VIP club.
Researched and implemented various on-page SEO improvements.
Managed Google Ads campaigns.
cv.technology: HTML5, CSS, JS, Vue.js, WordPress, Git, Ads, Jira

cv.title: Pentamedia
description: Collaborated on over 10 projects in LATAM and USA, making CSS adjustments and implementing visual improvements according to requirements. Some projects include ZeroMortgage, CTS Impact, and DocAR.
Developed the website for the visual production company methodmadness.tv, creating a specific module for video loading based on the director. This site was built with WordPress and Elementor.
Developed the website pienza.com.ar following the design provided by the company in Photoshop.
Designed in Figma and programmed all screens for a vehicle control and registration system using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project was done for Aguas Cordobesas.
Also worked collaboratively on the development of landing page and institutional websites.
cv.technology: CSS3, HTML5, PHP, Bootstrap, WordPress, Figma, SVN, GitLab

cv.title: Martinez Gavier Software
description: Developed and configured all aspects of an online store.
Configured specific hooks in WooCommerce for the payment process, package weight calculation, DNI input, among others.
Participated in the integration of the store with the company's management system.
Implemented changes and improvements on the website during Hot Sale campaigns to maximize results achieved during that period.

cv.title: 3 Focos Design
description: Programmed websites using HTML5 and CSS3.
Developed WordPress themes.
Performed WordPress theme customization.
Managed and configured several online stores using WordPress and Prestashop.
Provided support and maintenance for WordPress, including core and plugin updates and issue resolution.
Managed hosting, migrations, backups, and SSL certificate configuration.
Conducted SEO audits and optimized code and structure.
cv.technology: CSS3, HTML5, PHP, WordPress, Prestashop, Google Search Console, Figma, cPanel, WHC

cv.title: Peucor
description: Programmed and managed the website.
Managed online sales.
Provided support for online customers.
Performed SEO On/Off Page, achieving the number one result on Google for 'Repuestos Peugeot en Córdoba, Argentina' (Peugeot spare parts in Córdoba, Argentina).
cv.technology: Prestashop, CSS, HTML, PHP, Google Analytics, Google Search Console

cv.title: eGroup
description: Searched for link-building opportunities on relevant and high-quality websites.
Contacted website owners to request backlinks.
Created content with links to the target website.
Conducted research on the latest SEO trends.
cv.technology: Google Toolbar, Majestic SEO, Dreamweaver, HTML, CSS

servicesWeb.subtitle: Custom websites that drive business
servicesWeb.title: Website development
servicesWeb.description: Websites adapted to mobile devices and SEO-friendly. Custom design following UX UI standards.
servicesWeb.moreinfo1: If you are a designer or have a pre-designed project, I specialize in providing front-end development services to bring your designs. Whether you represent a company or are an individual, I can help create captivating and responsive layouts that showcase your vision effectively.
servicesWeb.moreinfo3: These are the 4 stages of my service

proccess.title: BRIEFING
proccess.description: Compilation of information and analysis on the site to be developed. Planning and definition of objectives.

proccess.title: DESIGN
proccess.description: Sitemap creation. Website design according to brand image.

proccess.title: DEVELOPMENT AND IMPLEMENTATION
proccess.description: Website programming, in this step I give life to the design.

proccess.title: PUBLICATION
proccess.description: Testing, delivery and launch of the site.

serviceMaintenance.title: Web Redesign and Maintenance
serviceMaintenance.line1: I specialize in enhancing the visual appearance, fixing technical errors, and optimizing the browsing experience on mobile devices.
maintenanceone: Website Redesign: I transform your existing site into an improved, modern, and attractive version. We will work together to reflect your brand identity and attract your visitors.
Error Correction in HTML, JS, and Media Queries: I resolve issues in the functionality and display of your website, ensuring a seamless experience across different devices.
maintenancetwo: Maintenance and updates of themes and core.
Installation, Updates, and Configuration of Plugins.
Test Website (Development Environment): I make changes and provide you with a preview before implementing them.
serviceMaintenance.line3: ¡Contáctame para obtener ayuda con tu sitio web de WordPress! Juntas haremos que destaque en el mundo digital.

works.title: Positivus
works.description: Responsive Website Development: React and Bootstrap - Specifically for digital marketing agencies

works.title: Method & Madness
works.description: Production Company. Page created with WordPress and Elementor. I developed a script to display background videos on mouse hover and a specific module to showcase a grid of videos by director.

works.title: Tratany Brewery
works.description: This project is a responsive website developed in React, following the UX standards and implementing the CSS BEM Model methodology. All images and the logo have been generated using artificial intelligence.

works.title: Video Game Website
works.description: This concept website that combines avatars and the God of War theme. The website is developed using React and incorporates React icons, Bootstrap, carousel, accordion, gradients, and it features a responsive and modern design.

works.title: Peucor E-commerce
works.description: Online store development in Prestashop, including administration and maintenance. Synchronization of stock and prices. SEO videoMp4ing: 1st result in Google for 'Repuestos Peugeot Córdoba Argentina'

works.title: Pienza GNI
works.description: Development in HTML5 and CSS. The company in charge of the project gave me the design in pothoshop.
